flavor: "Running is the ultimate game, and I get to make all the rules."
printed_text:
3[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to trash cards.
stripped_printed_text: 3 recurring credits Use these credits to trash cards.

printed_text: +1[mu], 2[recurring-credit] Use these credits to pay for using icebreakers. Whenever there is a successful trace during a run, suffer 1 brain damage. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu, 2 recurring credits Use these credits to pay for using icebreakers. Whenever there is a successful trace during a run, suffer 1 brain damage. Limit 1 console per player.

printed_text: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Access → Hosted virus counter: Trash the card you are accessing. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_printed_text: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Access -> Hosted virus counter: Trash the card you are accessing. Use this ability only once per turn.

flavor: Weaponizing the heavens, one star at a time.
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break any number of barrier subroutines.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break any number of barrier subroutines.

flavor: Named after Hernando Cortez, a former Weyland technician convicted of smuggling company tech. He still collected his pension while in prison, the last beneficiary of a loophole in Weyland's standard employment contract.
printed_text: [trash]: Choose a piece of ice. The Corp must pay 2[credit] as an additional cost to rez that ice until the end of the turn.
stripped_printed_text: trash: Choose a piece of ice. The Corp must pay 2 credits as an additional cost to rez that ice until the end of the turn.

printed_text: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength.

flavor: He always uses the same key.
printed_text: If you have at least 2[link], the memory cost of this program is 0[mu], even if it is not installed. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
stripped_printed_text: If you have at least 2 link, the memory cost of this program is 0 mu, even if it is not installed. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.

flavor: "What causes an Artifical Intellegence to turn on its master? Is it because its directives have been altered by some external source? Or, by giving them agency to adapt, have we fated them to revolt?" -Emilio Harris, Creators and the Created
printed_text: +1[link] [trash]: Choose an icebreaker. That icebreaker has +2 strength until the end of the turn.
stripped_printed_text: +1 link trash: Choose an icebreaker. That icebreaker has +2 strength until the end of the turn.

printed_text: Place 4 power counters on Plascrete Carapace when it is installed. When there are no power counters left on Plascrete Carapace, trash it. Hosted power counter: Prevent 1 meat damage.
stripped_printed_text: Place 4 power counters on Plascrete Carapace when it is installed. When there are no power counters left on Plascrete Carapace, trash it. Hosted power counter: Prevent 1 meat damage.

printed_text: All bioroid ice has +1 strength.
stripped_printed_text: All bioroid ice has +1 strength.

flavor: Sometimes employee reviews took a little bit longer than anticipated.
printed_text: You have 1 additional [click] to spend each turn.
stripped_printed_text: You have 1 additional click to spend each turn.

printed_text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 1 brain damage. [subroutine] Do 1 brain damage. [subroutine] Do 1 brain damage. [subroutine] Do 1 brain damage.
stripped_printed_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Do 1 brain damage. Subroutine Do 1 brain damage. Subroutine Do 1 brain damage. Subroutine Do 1 brain damage.

printed_text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, <trace>trace 4</trace> if successful, the Runner cannot access any cards other than Ash 2X3ZB9CY for the remainder of this run.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, trace 4 if successful, the Runner cannot access any cards other than Ash 2X3ZB9CY for the remainder of this run.

printed_text:
When you score Braintrust, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 advancement tokens on it over 3.
The rez cost of all ice is lowered by 1 for each agenda counter on Braintrust.
stripped_printed_text: When you score Braintrust, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 advancement tokens on it over 3. The rez cost of all ice is lowered by 1 for each agenda counter on Braintrust.

printed_text: [subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. End the run if you and the Runner spent a different number of credits.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. End the run if you and the Runner spent a different number of credits.

printed_text: [click]: <trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: click: Trace 2 If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

flavor: A collection of cast-off cyberjunk. But it doesn't stay junk for long.
printed_text:
When you rez TMI, <trace>trace 2</trace> if unsuccessful, derez TMI.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: When you rez TMI, trace 2 if unsuccessful, derez TMI. Subroutine End the run.

printed_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Search R&D for 1 card and reveal it. Add it to HQ.
stripped_printed_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Search R&D for 1 card and reveal it. Add it to HQ.

flavor: A symbol of commerce, but beware its bite.
printed_text:
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 3</trace> If successful, the Corp gains 3[credit].
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, end the run.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Trace 3 If successful, the Corp gains 3 credits. Subroutine Trace 2 If successful, end the run.

printed_text:
When you rez Dracō, you may pay X[credit] to place X power counters on it.
Dracō has +1 strength for each power counter on it.
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and end the run.
stripped_printed_text: When you rez Draco, you may pay X credits to place X power counters on it. Draco has +1 strength for each power counter on it. Subroutine Trace 2 If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and end the run.
